title: Me at the zoo
summary: The video 'Me at the zoo' is extremely safe for children 10 and below, with no issues found in terms of violence, language, scary content, or substance use. The content is family-friendly and promotes safe behavior. However, its educational value is moderate, as it may not be directly informative for young children.
comment_analysis: The overall sentiment is positive and nostalgic, with users from different years commenting on the iconic video. The comments are generally family-friendly and innocuous. Some users are commenting on the video's age and their own repeated views.
